text: Eupterote splendens is a moth in the family Eupterotidae. It was described by Nässig and C.H. Schulze in 2007. It is found in Indonesia (Sulawesi)., 2007: A second species with diurnal males of the genus Eupterote from Indonesia: Eupterote (Eupterote) splendens sp. n. from Sulawesi (Insecta, Lepidoptera, Bombycoidea, Eupterotidae). Senckenbergiana Biologica 87 (2): 189-194. ==References== Category:Moths described in 2007 Category:Eupterotinae
title: Eupterote splendens
